This directory contains some test documents.

 "InputFiles" directory contains 3 news articles.
    
        haber0.txt (14 sentences)
        haber1.txt (17 sentences)
        haber2.txt (12 sentences)
 
 "OzetFiles" directory contians 3 manually constructed summaries of news articles
in the "InputFiles" directory.

        ozet0.txt (3 sentences)
        ozet1.txt (5 sentences)
        ozet2.txt (5 sentences)
 
 "OutputFiles" contains automatically generated summaries by the application.
